document.full_text: japan is expected to unveil a scheme on thursday that includes a $62 billion fund injection to help tokyo electric power  compensate victims of the crisis at its tsunami-crippled nuclear plant and save asia's largest utility from financial ruin.
document.title: japan to unveil nuclear operator tepco compensation scheme
lines_and_colors: japan is expected to unveil a scheme on thursday that includes a $62 billion fund injection to help tokyo electric power  compensate victims of the crisis at its tsunami-crippled nuclear plant and save asia's largest utility from financial ruin.
